info.TITLE: About HOAY
info.TXT_ABOUT: HOAY ("How old are you") lets you calculate your age in a simple manner. The result displays the sum or the total values of years, months and days. Have fun!
info.TXT_CODE: HOAY is built with the JavaScript Framework <open-external url='http://angularjs.org/'>AngularJS</open-external> and <open-external url='http://phonegap.com/'>PhoneGap</open-external>. All <open-external url='https://github.com/sectore/hoay'>source code</open-external> is available at <open-external url='https://github.com/sectore/hoay'>GitHub</open-external>.
